```{r}
##clear working environment
rm(list=ls())


##load packages
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(PNWColors)

#set working directory if necessary, commented out 
#setwd("~/Documents/Work/Chap1/HBProphage_PeerJ/")

#set palette and graph theme
pal4=pnw_palette("Sailboat",7, type = "continuous") 

theme1 <- theme_linedraw() + 
  theme(
      legend.position="left", 
      plot.title = element_text(size=15),
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 270, size= 30, vjust=1, hjust=0),
      axis.text.y = element_text(size=9),
      axis.title.y = element_text(size=10, angle=90),
      axis.ticks.length = unit(.3, "cm")
    ) 

theme_set(theme1)

##### Load and Clean Data ##

##tax: output of the top hits between phage and dereplicated caudovirales phage from inphared 
tax<-read.delim("data/raw/CAUDO_rd2_checkvbee_inphared_topgen_fam_ani.tsv", header=FALSE)
colnames(tax)[1:6]=c("phage", "ref_tax", "top_phage_fam", "fam_ani", "hit_prot", "prot_frac")

##derep: list of all phage and their status as a representative phage or not
derep <- read.csv("data/dc525_dRepList.csv", row.names=1)
derep <- derep[,c(1,2,3)]

##phage.out: list of all high confident phage with bacterial host information
phage.out<-read.csv("data/dc525_5kbdsDNAphage.csv", row.names=1)
```


##Derep
```{r}
##merge tax and derep list, remove non-rep phage
derep.tax1 <- merge(tax, derep, by.y="phage_seq", by.x="phage", all.x=TRUE, all.y=TRUE)
derep.tax <- subset(derep.tax1, derep.tax1$representative=="reference_phage")

## add in bacterial host information
merge <- merge(derep.tax, phage.out, by.x="phage", by.y="phage_seqname", all.x=TRUE, all.y=FALSE)

gvog.base <-merge[,c(1:8,13)] ##keep relevant columns


##any phage with NA for top_phage_fam had no top hit
gvog.base$top_phage_fam[is.na(gvog.base$top_phage_fam)] <- "unclassified_nohit"
gvog.base[is.na(gvog.base)] <- 0


##create tally
gvog.base$tally <-1

##set levels
gvog.base$FinalGroup <- factor(gvog.base$FinalGroup,levels = c('Bartonella apis', 'Bifidobacterium asteroides', 'Bifidobacterium coryneforme', 'Bifidobacterium indicum', 'Frischella perrara', 'Lactobacillus mellifer', 'Lactobacillus mellis', 'Lactobacillus apis', 'Lactobacillus helsingborgensis', 'Lactobacillus kimbladii', 'Lactobacillus kullabergensis', 'Lactobacillus melliventris', 'Lactobacillus kunkeei', 'Bombella apis', 'Snodgrassella alvi', 'Bombella sp.', 'Commensalibacter sp.', 'Gilliamella apis', 'Gilliamella apicola', 'Melissococcus plutonius', 'Paenibacillus larvae'))


unique(gvog.base$top_phage_fam) ## Only families present are Siph, Myo, Podo and unclassified/no hit 


##create new database for counting
allhits <- gvog.base 

#create a final family and weak family classification column
allhits$finalfam <- "tbd"
allhits$wkfam <- 0

## if a phage has a top hit to a family with greater than 50% alignment, classify that reference family as the "final family" (finalfam)
allhits$finalfam <- ifelse(allhits$prot_frac>=.5, allhits$top_phage_fam, allhits$finalfam)

#if a phage has a top hit below 20% alignment, classify its final family as "Unclassified"
allhits$finalfam <- ifelse(allhits$prot_frac<0.2, "Unclassified", allhits$finalfam)

#if a phage's top hit is greater than 20% alignment but it has not yet been officially classified (so below 50%), classify the column wkfam with that family as a weak association (wkfam)
allhits$wkfam <- ifelse(allhits$prot_frac>=0.2 & allhits$finalfam=="tbd", allhits$top_phage_fam, allhits$wkfam)

##Rename wkfam values
allhits$wkfam <-ifelse(allhits$wkfam=="Siphoviridae", "Weak_Siphoviridae", allhits$wkfam)
allhits$wkfam <-ifelse(allhits$wkfam=="Myoviridae", "Weak_Myoviridae", allhits$wkfam)
allhits$wkfam <-ifelse(allhits$wkfam=="Podoviridae", "Weak_Podoviridae", allhits$wkfam)

##if finalfam is still unclassified (indicated by "tbd"), now replace it with the  string in the wkfam column
allhits$finalfam <- ifelse(allhits$finalfam=="tbd", allhits$wkfam, allhits$finalfam)

##tally up phage taxonomy hits 

  tally <- allhits 

  #create columns  
  tally$Siph <- 0
  tally$Pod <- 0
  tally$Myo <- 0
  tally$Hell <- 0
  tally$Siph_wk <- 0
  tally$Pod_wk <-0
  tally$Myo_wk <-0
  tally$Uncl <- 0

  tally$total.class <-0
  tally$total.all <-0

  #count  
  tally$Siph <- ifelse(tally$finalfam=="Siphoviridae", 1, 0)
  tally$Siph_wk <- ifelse(tally$finalfam =="Weak_Siphoviridae", 1, 0)
  tally$Pod <- ifelse(tally$finalfam =="Podoviridae", 1, 0)
  tally$Pod_wk <- ifelse(tally$finalfam =="Weak_Podoviridae", 1, 0)
  tally$Myo <- ifelse(tally$finalfam =="Myoviridae", 1, 0)
  tally$Myo_wk <- ifelse(tally$finalfam =="Weak_Myoviridae", 1, 0)
  tally$Uncl <- ifelse(tally$finalfam =="Unclassified" | tally$finalfam=="unclassified_nohit", 1, 0)
  
  tally$total.class <- tally$Siph + tally$Pod + tally$Myo   ##count how many are strongly classified
  tally$total.all <- tally$Siph + tally$Pod + tally$Myo + tally$Uncl + tally$Siph_wk + tally$Myo_wk + tally$Pod_wk  ##count how many total classified/weak/unclassified

  
  tally$all_placeholder <- "all!"

##sum up the number of each phage family per bacterial host
group.tax <- aggregate(tally[, 13:22], by=list(tally$all_placeholder, tally$FinalGroup), FUN=sum)
colnames(group.tax)[1:2] = c("All", "FinalGroup")

#sum up the number of each phage family across all phage (not accounting for bacterial host)
all.tax <- aggregate(tally[,13:22], by=list(tally$all_placeholder), FUN=sum)
colnames(all.tax)[1] = c("all_phage")



##pivot dataframes to graph

all.piv <- all.tax  %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c("Siph", "Siph_wk", "Myo", "Myo_wk", "Pod", "Pod_wk", "Uncl"),  
    names_to = "Tax", 
    names_prefix = "wk",
    values_to = "NumPhage",
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  )

all.piv$percent <- all.piv$NumPhage/all.piv$total.all*100

group.piv <- group.tax %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c("Siph", "Siph_wk", "Myo", "Myo_wk", "Pod", "Pod_wk", "Uncl"), 
    names_to = "Tax", 
    names_prefix = "wk",
    values_to = "NumPhage",
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  )
group.piv$percent <- group.piv$NumPhage/all.piv$total.all*100

#create a taxonomy bar graph divided by bacterial hosts

stack50.50 <- ggplot(group.piv, aes(fill=Tax, y=NumPhage, x=FinalGroup)) + 
    geom_bar(position="stack", stat="identity") +
    xlab("") + ylab("Taxonomic Distribution of Prophage") +  scale_fill_manual(values=pal4, labels=c('Myoviridae', 'Weakly Myoviridae', 'Podoviridae', 'Weakly Podoviridae', 'Siphoviridae', 'Weakly Siphoviridae', 'Unclassified')) + xlab("") 


stack50.50 <-  ggpar(stack50.50, font.tickslab = c(10), xtickslab.rt = 50) + font("xy.text", size = 10)

stack50.50

ggsave("figs/Fig5.png", width=7, height=5)
```
